name: Tulip Tex
description:
In 1637 the tulip exchange crashed because of a great bubble. It´s time to make as much money as you can until it´s too late.

Each playthrough is random and even could get worser.

Actually intended for a 1-Hour Game-Jam, I wanted to polish the game a little bit more and add little tweaks to it. So I took the time (3 hours or so) and did this.
